Gauge.Name: GPS_500
Gauge.Macro: (@g:menuBlinker) d 0 > if{ -- (>@g:menuBlinker) 15 sp0 1 } els{ l0 -- s0 d 0 <= if{ 30 sp0 } 15 > }
@1 0.55 * sp1 1 sp0 :1 @CalculateZoomFactor(l0) 1852 * l1 < if{ l0 ++ sp0 g1 } l0

@1 @FPLEnrouteHeader - sp0 1 (@c:FlightPlanWaypointsNumber) 1 - l0 rng (@c:FlightPlanIsActiveFlightPlan) and (@c:FlightPlanIsActiveFlightPlan) if{ (@c:FlightPlanWaypointsNumber) } els{ 0 } ++ d (@c:FlightPlanApproachWaypointsNumber) + 1 - l0 rng (@c:FlightPlanIsLoadedApproach) and or

Element.Name: ViewWindow

FormattedText.String: %((A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool))%{if}%((A:GPS WP NEXT ID, string))%!s!%{end}
%((A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool))%{if}%((A:GPS WP BEARING, degrees) d360)%!03d!\{dplo=M}%{end}
%((A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool))%{if}%((A:GPS COURSE TO STEER, degrees) d360)%!03d!\{dplo=M}%{end}
%((A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool))%{if}%((A:GPS WP ETA, hours) flr 100 %)%!02d!:%((A:GPS WP ETA, minutes) flr 60 %)%!02d!\{dpl=LC}%{end}
%((A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool))%{if}%((A:GPS WP VERTICAL SPEED, feet per second))%!d!\{dpl=fs}%{end}
%((A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool))%{if}%((A:GPS WP TRACK ANGLE ERROR, degrees))%!d!°%{end}

%((A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool))%{if}%((A:GPS WP CROSS TRK, nmiles) s1 abs d s0 100 >=)%{if}%!d!%{else}%(l0 10 >=)%{if}%!.1f!%{else}%!.2f!%{end}%{end}\{dpl=nm}%(l1 100 * near s0 0 >)%{if}>%{else}%(l0 0 <)%{if}<%{end}%{end}%{end}

Rotate.Value: (@g:currentPageNAV) @kNAVPageDflt == if{ 0 } els{ (A:GPS GROUND TRUE TRACK, Radians) }

Element.Visible: (A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool) (@g:currentPageNAV) 0 == and
(A:GPS WP TRACK ANGLE ERROR, degrees) abs 60 <

FormattedText.String: %((A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool))%{if}%((A:GPS WP DESIRED TRACK, degrees) d360)%!03d!%{else}_ _ _%{end}\{dplo=M}
%((A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool))%{if}%((A:GPS WP DISTANCE, nmiles) near)%!d!%{else}_ _ _%{end}\{dpl=nm}
%((A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool))%{if}%((A:GPS WP ETE, hours) flr 100 %)%!02d!:%((A:GPS WP ETE, minutes) flr 60 %)%!02d!%{else}_ _:_ _%{end}

Element.Name: Active Leg Indicator
Element.Visible: (@g:currentGroup) @kNAVPageGroup == (@g:currentPageNAV) @kNAVPageDflt == (A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool) and and

Select.Value: (A:GPS IS APPROACH ACTIVE, bool) if{ 8 0 0 0 3 2 7 6 5 4 0 0 12 (A:GPS APPROACH WP TYPE, enum) case } els{ 1 0 (A:GPS IS DIRECTTO FLIGHTPLAN, bool) ? }

Element.Visible: (A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool) ! (A:GPS WP CROSS TRK, nmiles) (@g:scaleCDI) /-/ >= ||
(A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool) ! (A:GPS WP CROSS TRK, nmiles) (@g:scaleCDI) <= ||
(A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool) (A:GPS WP CROSS TRK, nmiles) abs (@g:scaleCDI) <= and
(A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool) (A:GPS WP CROSS TRK, nmiles) (@g:scaleCDI) > and

FormattedText.String: %((A:GPS WP CROSS TRK, nmiles) abs d s0 100 >=)%{if}%!d!%{else}%(l0 10 >=)%{if}%!.1f!%{else}%!.2f!%{end}%{end}\{dpl=nm}>

Element.Visible: (A:GPS IS ACTIVE WAY POINT, bool) (A:GPS WP CROSS TRK, nmiles) (@g:scaleCDI) /-/ < and

FormattedText.String: <%((A:GPS WP CROSS TRK, nmiles) abs d s0 100 >=)%{if}%!d!%{else}%(l0 10 >=)%{if}%!.1f!%{else}%!.2f!%{end}%{end}\{dpl=nm}
%((E:UNITS OF MEASURE, enum) 1 <= if{ (@c:WaypointAirportElevation, feet) } els{ (@c:WaypointAirportElevation, meters) } )%!d!%((E:UNITS OF MEASURE, enum) 1 <=)%{if}\{dpl=ft}%{else}m%{end}

\{ladj=L}%( (E:UNITS OF MEASURE, enum) 1 < if{ (@c:WaypointAirportRunwayLength, feet) } els{ (@c:WaypointAirportRunwayLength, meters) } )%!d!%((E:UNITS OF MEASURE, enum) 1 <)%{if}\{dpl=ft}%{else}m%{end}\n \{ladj=R}x %( (E:UNITS OF MEASURE, enum) 1 < if{ (@c:WaypointAirportRunwayWidth, feet) } els{ (@c:WaypointAirportRunwayWidth, meters) } )%!d!%((E:UNITS OF MEASURE, enum) 1 <)%{if}\{dpl=ft}%{else}m%{end}\n

CustomDraw.Name: fs9gps:map

Mouse.Name: MouseRoutines
Mouse.Macro: (A:PARTIAL PANEL ELECTRICAL, bool) (A:PARTIAL PANEL AVIONICS, bool) or not
@PowerOn if{ @EscapeMenu @kNRSTPageGroup (>@g:currentGroup) @PageInit }
@PowerOn if{ @EscapeMenu (@c:FlightPlanIsActiveWaypointLocked) ! (>@c:FlightPlanIsActiveWaypointLocked) }
@PowerOn if{ (@g:messagePopup) @kOff == if{ @kOn (>@g:messagePopup) 1 (>@c:NewMessagesConfirm) } els{ @kOff (>@g:messagePopup) } }
@PowerOn if{ @EscapeMenu (@g:currentGroup) @kFPLPageGroup == if{ @kNAVPageGroup (>@g:currentGroup) } els{ @kFPLPageGroup (>@g:currentGroup) } @PageInit }
@PowerOn if{ @EscapeMenu (@g:setup_ColorTerrain) ! (>@g:setup_ColorTerrain) }
@PowerOn if{ @EscapeMenu (@g:currentGroup) @kPROCPageGroup == if{ @kNAVPageGroup (>@g:currentGroup) } els{ @kPROCPageGroup (>@g:currentGroup) } @ProcedurePageInit }

Area.Name: CLR/QUIT Button
Area.Click: (M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ (@g:clrButtonDown) 0 == if{ 1 (>@g:clrButtonDown) 0 (>@g:clrButtonCount) } } (M:Event) 'Leave' scmp 0 == if{ (@g:clrButtonDown) 1 == if{ 0 (>@g:clrButtonDown) (@g:clrButtonCount) @CLRButtonDelay < if{ @CLRButton } } }

Mouse.Macro: 0 (>@g:listCurrent) 0 (>@g:listScroll)
@1 (>@c:IcaoSearchInitialIcao) @2 (>@c:IcaoSearchStartCursor) @3 (>@g:enteringInput) 0 (>@c:IcaoSearchMatchedIcao) @InitBlinker
@1 (>@c:NameSearchInitialIcao) @2 (>@c:NameSearchInitialName) @3 (>@c:NameSearchStartCursor) @4 (>@g:enteringInput) @InitBlinker
